means: 解放某人（尤指摆脱政治、法律或社会的束缚）( emancipate的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Innovation requires emancipating our minds, seeking truth from facts and keeping pace with the times.
sentence.Network_cn: 创新就要不断解放思想、实事求是 、 与时俱进.

sentence.Network_en: The harmonious society is important content of Marx's mankind emancipating thought.
sentence.Network_cn: 和谐社会是马克思人类解放思想中的重要内容.

sentence.Network_en: All this measures are at further emancipating the productive forces.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些措施都着眼于进一步解放生产力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ecofeminism provides a new perspective for solving ecological crisis and emancipating females .生态女性主义为我们对生态危机的解决和妇女的解放提供了一个全新的视角。

list.abs: he believes very strongly in female emancipation ., 他强烈主张妇女解放.
...犹太解放运动（Jewish emancipation）是欧洲犹太人权利自18世纪起从外在和阿什肯纳兹犹太人|内在同时争取的这一进程。包括同等公民权利的认定，以及个人公民身份的授予等。成果来自于社区内的努力，使得得以整合进入社会而成为公民。这一运动随着启蒙时代与同时期的哈斯卡拉运动|犹太启蒙运动开始，自18世纪末起.
商贸中... ... 三通一平 three side connections and one site leveling 解放思想 emancipate minds “一刀切” impose uniformity.
1862年9月22日,林肯总统颁发《解放黑人奴隶宣言》(emancipation proclamation),目前世界上最强大的国家从轨制上纯粹拔除奴隶制。1863年1月1日又正式号令解放奴隶。

entry.def: If people are emancipated, they are freed from unpleasant or unfair social, political, or legal restrictions.

example.tran: 天主教徒在1792年获得了解放。

example.ex: That war preserved the Union and emancipated the slaves...
example.tran: 那场战争保住了联邦政府，并解放了奴隶。

auth_sentence.content: She explains the emancipating effect of the bicycle.
auth_sentence.res_content: She explains the emancipating effect of the bicycle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She explains the emancipating effect of the bicycle.

auth_sentence.content: It is a way of emancipating yourself from your past, particularly if you have unhappy associations.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a way of emancipating yourself from your past, particularly if you have unhappy associations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a way of emancipating yourself from your past, particularly if you have unhappy associations.

Sentence.sentence: Writer friends of mine pay good money to get the Freedom software that enables them to disable the very Internet connections that seemed so emancipating not long ago.
